Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to eligibility to assume office for certain elected officials owing past-due tax liabilities
Summary: Relates to eligibility to assume office for certain elected officials owing past-due tax liabilities.
LawCode: Add ยง3-a, Leg L; amd ยง3, Pub Off L; add ยง171-x, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, the public officers law and the tax law, in relation to eligibility to assume office for persons owing past-due tax liabilities
